Title: A Cosmic Christmas
Writer: Patrick Loubert (story), Ida Nelson (screenplay), Laura Paull (screenplay), Ken Sobol (additional scenes), Martin Lavut (additional scenes)
Actors: Joey Davidson, Martin Lavut, Richard M. Davidson, Duncan Regehr
Plot: An animated film in which a town rediscovers the real spirit of Christmas, thanks to three visitors from outer space and a little boy named Peter. Commercialism and greed seem to contradict the meaning of Christmas, and when Peter's pet goose is kidnapped, things look even worse. An exciting rescue results in a new sense of caring and sharing.
